sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row fluid fill-height>
      <v-col md="5">
        <v-text-field
          v-model="search"
          append-icon="mdi-magnify"
          label="Search"
          single-line
          hide-details
          class="my-2"
        ></v-text-field>
        <v-card class="my-3">
         <v-card-text class="text-right">
            <v-btn
              fab
              dark
              small
              color="indigo"
            >
              <v-icon dark>
                mdi-plus
              </v-icon>
            </v-btn>
         </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
        <v-data-table
            :headers="headers"
            :items="content"
            :items-per-page="20"
            :search="search"
            class="elevation-1"
        >
        <template v-slot:[`item.actions`]>
            <v-btn
              depressed
              color="primary"
            >
              Details
            </v-btn>
        </template>
        </v-data-table>
      </v-col>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title class="text-right">
            mq connection creds [20c794f4-46d2-46a1-af19-5efbd1addf5d]
          </v-card-title>
          <v-card-text height='85vh'>
            <v-textarea
              class="mt-4"
              outlined
              name="input-7-4"
              label="static content"
              value="The Woodman set to work at once, and so sharp was his axe that the tree was soon chopped nearly through."
            ></v-textarea>
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data: () => ({
        search: '',
        headers: [
          {
            text: 'unique key',
            align: 'start',
            sortable: false,
            value: 'key',
          },
          { text: 'name', value: 'name' },
          { text: 'Actions', value: 'actions'}
        ],
        content: [
           { key: '20c794f4-46d2-46a1-af19-5efbd1addf5d', name: 'mq connection creds'},
           { key: '20c794f4-46d2-46a1-a19-5efbd1addf5d', name: 'datapools caches'},
        ]
    }),
  }
</script>
